bibl.title: Time in Timeless Wisdom: The Use of Tense in Egyptian and Greek Sayings (with Some Advice to Grammarians).
Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008.

bibl.note: Addresses the issue of the use and meaning of the tenses employed in sayings included in Demotic instructions and Greek wisdom collections [Menandri monostichoi, etc.]. - Introduction. - Grammar books, tense and genre. - Present. - Other tenses. - Conclusions.

Mark Depauw & Yanne Broux (edd.), Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 231 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 127-143.

Addresses the issue of the use and meaning of the tenses employed in sayings included in Demotic instructions and Greek wisdom collections [Menandri monostichoi, etc.]. - Introduction. - Grammar books, tense and genre. - Present. - Other tenses. - Conclusions.
